title: Urfwick?
body: Hey I have over 150k blue essence but it still says not enough blue essence when I go to buy urfwick?  Is this intended or no?

replies.body: It looks like you're just under 150k BE and the client is rounding up for some weird reason causing you to think you have enough. As of posting this, you're currently sitting right at 149,809 BE. You should be able to disenchant something to push yourself over that threshold for Urfwick!
